desc: 蒼惶龍エストレイトの浄化作用のある鱗。

dictionary.lore: Thanks to the purifying properties of the Azure Dragon Estoreit's scales, any sea it inhabits is seldom polluted. However, it is due to the rare qualities of Estoreit's Light Scales that the dragon has been the target of many attacks that have laid waste upon its habitat. These attacks have caused one of its wings to become detached, and now it cannot fly as freely as it once did.

name: 蒼龍の光鱗

usage.name: 魔鳳冠ヴァーミリオン
